name: Oddsburg Zine of Miracles
description:
Made for the Zig Jam, Based off the Augsburg Book of Miracles, I made a tiny version of a project I’ve wanted to do for a long time of a speculative fictional “future/alternate medieval times” Augsburg book of miracles just named “Oddsburg.” 

Will redo in the future as an analog art book because I love this idea but for now enjoy this tiny pos for zig jam!
